update revenue set parent = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, before_salary = #{beforeSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sum_salary = #{sumSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, five_money = #{fiveMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sum_five = #{sumFive,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zhuan_money = #{zhuanMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sum_zhuan = #{sumZhuan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, base_reduce = #{baseReduce,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sum_base = #{sumBase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ying_salary = #{yingSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shui_percent = #{shuiPercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, su_kou = #{suKou,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lei_ying = #{leiYing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lei_jiao = #{leiJiao,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dang = #{dang,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select max(id) as id, parent as parent, user_id as userId, month as month, max(before_salary) as beforeSalary, max(sum_salary) as sumSalary, max(five_money) as fiveMoney, max(sum_five) as sumFive, max(zhuan_money) as zhuanMoney, max(sum_zhuan) as sumZhuan, max(base_reduce) as baseReduce, max(sum_base) as sumBase, max(ying_salary) as yingSalary, max(shui_percent) as shuiPercent, max(su_kou) as suKou, max(lei_ying) as leiYing, max(lei_jiao) as leiJiao, max(dang) as dang from revenue where user_id = #{userId} group by user_id,parent,month
